attributes.action: Exclude G81 Postcode Area from Google Streetview
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Google Streetview hopes to create a browsable collection of photographs of every UK street on their maps website.  I would like to see the G81 postcode area excluded except for key Public Buildings to respect human rights and privacy, and to protect children.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
